name: SoCal Traffic School
tag_list: traffic-school, online-traffic-school, traffic-school-online, cheapest-traffic-school, fastest-traffic-school, california-traffic-school
overview:
SoCal Traffic School offers online traffic ticket dismissal and insurance reduction.

SoCal Traffic School online class may be taken on any computer with internet capability, and you are free to stop and start as often as you want (without losing your completed work).

The course is divided into chapters and each chapter into various sections. A short quiz (all multiple-choice), is given at the end of each chapter to help prepare you for the final exam (the quizzes however, are not graded).

After you have passed the class’s final exam, SoCalTrafficSchool.com will send your completion certificate to your selected court free of charge.
